attributes.action: Add a foum/discussion board for each petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It makes no sense that people sign a petition on the site with a name like:
"No this is a stupid suggestion!"
It would be far more sensible if there was a discussion board under each petition so we could discuss the pros and cons without clogging up the petition itself...

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
